text:
Graphing a Piecewise Function

g(x)\left\{\begin{array}{cc}\n-2 & \text { if } x<-4 \\\nx-3 & \text { if }-1 \leq x \leq 5 \\\n2 x-15 & \text { if } x>7\n\end{array}\right.[imath]-2 & \text { if } x<-4 [/imath] [imath]x-3 & \text { if }-1 \leq x \leq 5 [/imath] [imath]2 x-15 & \text { if } x>7[/imath]
